uk.co.crider.jablus.env

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.data.CompoundData
      • uk.co.crider.jablus.env.Environment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Data, DataSet, DriverDynamic, DriverEndogeneous
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicEnv, DairyFarm, LandUseEnv

    public abstract class Environment
extends CompoundData
implements DriverDynamic, DriverEndogeneous
    Class to represent an environment upon which an agent can act Model environments should extend this class

    • Method Detail

      • init

        protected final void init()
        Causes all environment objects to be placed activated so that they will run properly. This should be called by all subclasses of environment (usually in the constructor) after all initialisation tasks are complete

      • notifyAgent

        public abstract void notifyAgent(Agent agent)
        Informs the environment of the arrival of a new agent

        Inform environment of a new step
